name: Starbucks Classic White Mug
description: The iconic Starbucks white ceramic mug featuring the classic siren logo. Perfect for your morning coffee ritual at home.

name: Starbucks Reserve Black Mug
description: A bold matte black mug from the Starbucks Reserve collection. Elegant design with a comfortable handle for everyday use.

name: Holiday Season Red Mug
description: Celebrate the season with this festive red mug adorned with holiday-themed Starbucks artwork. A collector's edition piece.

name: City Edition Seattle Mug
description: Commemorate the birthplace of Starbucks with this Seattle city edition mug. Features iconic Seattle landmarks and the original store design.

name: Starbucks Ceramic Travel Mug
description: Take your coffee on the go with this double-walled ceramic travel mug. Keeps drinks hot for up to 2 hours with a secure lid.

name: Pike Place Market Mug
description: A tribute to the historic Pike Place Market where Starbucks was born. Hand-painted details capture the vibrant market atmosphere.
